title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets Across Southern Lebanon: Detailed Report and Exclusive Footage”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a series of targets belonging to the terrorist organization Hezbollah in five different areas in southern Lebanon; among them a military building inhabited by members of the organization.

Earlier today, air force fighter jets attacked a military building in Maroun al-Ras where terrorists from the terrorist organization Hezbollah were staying. After striking the building, numerous secondary explosions were visible, indicating the presence of weapons at that location. In addition, three observation posts and a military building of the terrorist organization Hezbollah were attacked in Shtula, Yaroun, Taybeh, and Tyr Hefa in southern Lebanon.

Furthermore, IDF forces attacked several other areas in southern Lebanon.

Attached is footage from the strikes: https://bit.ly/426WjNE
